about_the_game:
The original soundtracks are composed by Ziyi Zhang. The music itself narrates the game story. It is recommended to put on a headphone to enjoy.

The tracks

  • Where Are You
  • Night Sky
  • A Different Room
  • Timeless
  • Passage
  • She Is Not Here
  • Save Her, from Dreams
  • Fallen Dreams
  • Exit
detailed_description:
The original soundtracks are composed by Ziyi Zhang. The music itself narrates the game story. It is recommended to put on a headphone to enjoy.

The tracks

  • Where Are You
  • Night Sky
  • A Different Room
  • Timeless

  • Save Her, from Dreams
  • Fallen Dreams

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphone recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal support
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphone recommended
